stack.summary: Implement comprehensive test coverage, security hardening, and code quality improvements for the Spinal Cord hooks system

fields.who: Spinal Cord hooks system (pre-bash, bun-enforcer, goal-compliance-gate, etc.)
fields.what: Fix security gaps, enable skipped tests, reduce lint warnings, fix goal compliance false positive
fields.when: Ongoing maintenance until all tests pass and lint warnings resolved
fields.why: Tests were skipped, security functions incomplete, goal compliance hook had false positive due to stale session goal
fields.how: 1. Extended emoji detection to include regional indicators 2. Extended deletion detection to include unlink/shred/find-delete/git-clean 3. Enabled 5 skipped security tests 4. Created 27 bun-enforcer tests 5. Fixed goal stack session data
fields.lest: Security gaps allow forbidden commands through hooks, tests remain skipped hiding real failures, stale goals cause false compliance rejections
fields.with: Vitest test framework, bun runtime, TypeScript, XO linter with Prettier
fields.measuredBy: All 1565 tests passing, 0 lint errors, goal compliance gate passes for valid goals
